text: “Sunshine" is a song produced by French DJ David Guetta and Swedish DJ Avicii, from Guetta's fifth studio album, Nothing but the Beat. It entered the Swedish Charts at number 59. It was also nominated for a Grammy Award for Best Dance Recording. == Background == "Sunshine" is a progressive house song written in the key of C♯ minor. It follows the chord progression of C♯m/B/E-A/B/C♯ and runs at 128 bpm. Category:2011 songs Category:David Guetta songs Category:Avicii songs
title: Sunshine (David Guetta song)
